Explanation: Reduces space heating demand.
Reduces space heating demand.
Reduces space heating demand.
Residential buildings which are not multi-storey apartment blocks.

Norwegian explanation: Bygningsarealet har ikke utført enøk eller rehabilitering.
Explanation: The floor area/building has not completed any measures.
Residential apartments. An apartment block contains multiple apartments.

Norwegian explanation: De 11 bygningskategoriene I TEK som ikke er boliger.
Explanation: The 11 building categories in the building code that are not residential buildings.
Energy product.

Norwegian explanation: Oppvarmingsteknologi, punktoppvarming. For eksempel panelovn eller vifteovn.
Explanation: Heating technology, space heating. For example electrical panel heater or convection oven.
Heating technology using fuel wood. Space heating.

Norwegian explanation: Punktoppvarming, kan ikke varme opp hele bygningen med én enhet.
Explanation: Point source and cannot heat an entire building with one unit.
Electric water heater for domestic hot water.
Water-borne heating.
Water-borne heating.
Water-borne heating.
Water-borne heating.

Norwegian explanation: Samlebegrep for alle varmepumper som leverer vannbåren varme.
Explanation: Term for all heat pumps that delivers water-borne heating.

Norwegian explanation: Vannbåren varme. Hentet fra SSB sin fjernvarmestatistikk for kalibrering.
Explanation: Water-borne heating. Uses Statistics Norways district heating statistics for calibration.

Norwegian explanation: Energiforbruk som krever elektrisitet, som belysning. Kan ikke erstattes med andre energivarer.
Explanation: Electricity usage which cannot be replaced by another technology or energy product. Like lighting and electrical appliances.
Cooling technology. Uses electricity.
The conditon of the heated floor area.

Norwegian explanation: Omfatter kun lagerbygg i modellen. En underkategori av lettindustri og verksted.
Explanation: Consists only of storage and warehouses in the model. A subcategory of light industry and workshops.

Norwegian explanation: Arealets energibehov i kWh/m2 etter definisjon i TEK. Energimengden arealet trenger for å fungere optimalt. Teoretisk størrelse.
Explanation: The area's energy need in kWh/m\ :sup:`2` as defined in the building code. This is the amount of energy the area needs to function properly. A theoretical size.

Norwegian explanation: Den energimengden arealet må få tilført for å dekke energibehovet. Målbar mengde. I kWh/m\ :sup:`2`.
Explanation: The amount of delivered energy the area requires in order to cover the energy need. In kWh/m\ :sup:`2` This is a measurable quantity.
Energy product used by the heating technology.
